messages.body: Hi. We'd like to place the same order as last month for KNM Coffee.
Good morning. Last month was 5 bags to Changi Hospital, correct?
Yes. Same product, same quantity, same address.
5 bags KNM Coffee at $25 each, $125. Delivery address Changi Hospital Wars 24 Singapore 700339.
Correct. Can we get delivery by November 30?
November 30 works. Same contact for receiving?
Yes, same as before. Receiving dock, Gate A.
Noted. Net 30 from delivery as before?
Yes. Our PO is PO-2024-11-401.
I'll generate the sales order. Same specs — 1kg bags, carton of 10, we'll send 5 bags.
Yes. No changes to the product.
SO-2024-1102. 5 bags KNM Coffee, Nov 30, Changi Hospital. Sent to your email.
Received. All details match our standing order.
We'll confirm 48 hours before delivery. Morning slot as usual.
Good. Invoice to same address — accounts@hospital.sg?
Yes, we have that on file. Invoice will go there after delivery.
Thank you. We'll likely repeat again next month.
Just send us the request when you're ready. Same process.
Understood. Bye.
Bye.
One more thing — do you need a new PO every month or can we use a standing PO?
We need a PO reference per order for our records. Same number series is fine if your system allows.
We'll keep issuing monthly POs then. Thanks.
No problem. Anything else on this order?
No. That's it.
Thank you. Good day.
You too.
Confirming: 5 bags KNM Coffee, $125, Nov 30, Changi Hospital Wars 24, Net 30, PO-2024-11-401.
All correct.
Great. We're all set.
Last month's payment was received on time. No issues.
Good to hear. We'll keep the same terms.
Perfect. Bye.
Bye.
Quality was consistent last time. No complaints.
Good to hear. We maintain the same batch standards.
We'll stick with the same order then.
Whenever you're ready for next month, just message with the same details.
Will do. Thanks.
Thank you. Have a good day.
You too.
Delivery note will reference SO-2024-1102 and your PO.
Understood. We'll file it with the PO.
Perfect. We're all set.
Bye.
Bye.
We might need 6 bags in December. We'll confirm when we place that order.
No problem. Same process — just specify 6 bags when you're ready.
Good. Thanks.
You're welcome.
